Articles.Content:
Here we have the third and final of my early access survivor aircrafts, the Vulture. This aircraft keeps amazing me still to this day with its amazing lift capacity (capable of lifting 80 tons with a breeze but 100 tons was a bit too much ), it also flyes really smooth and nice and aint too bad in terms of speed after having to go trough engine nerfs and aerodynamical changes (altough i did have to change the under wing engines from the TFE731 turbo fans to the D-30F7 turbojets). I just love the way this aircraft looks, i was inspired by some of the Russian cold-war bomber designs like the M-4 Bison and the TU-104. The flat top of the aircraft ensures maximum mountability for items such as the Buran shuttle or a huge cargo capsule or whatever you wanna use it for.

Here are some picks of the aircraft in action.

So i hope you enjoyed this beast of an aircraft that i made about 2-3 years ago .

Mods used: B9 Aerospace.

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vbrfm7wy4bt35ap/kerpolev-105%20vulture%20%28flagless%29.craft?dl=0 (aircraft supplied will be flagless).
